price: (Musa) akasema: Ewe Harun! Ni nini kilicho kuzuia, ulipo waona wamepotea,
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
